criticalSuccess.message: Choose two of the following: You learn which skill that can Influence Jubilost has the lowest DC (skipping any skills that you already know), one of Jubilost’s personal biases, one of Jubilost’s resistances, or one of Jubilost’s weaknesses. you can choose the same option twice to learn two pieces of information from the same category.

success.message: Choose one of the following: You learn which skill that can Influence Jubilost has the lowest DC (skipping any skills that you already know), one of Jubilost’s personal biases, one of Jubilost’s resistances, or one of Jubilost’s weaknesses.

criticalFailure.message: Choose a piece of information to learn about, as success, but the information is incorrect. For instance, you might think Jubilost is susceptible to flattery when actually Jubilost is resistant to flattery.
